message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. Accept this and we can both go home happy!
You're not getting all the money, Alice!
You're being too greedy, Bob! This is a fair offer, take it or leave it!
You're getting closer to the mark, Alice, but I'm not there yet!
I'm getting closer to what I want, Bob. Meet me in the middle or we'll be in trouble!
You're getting closer to the bottom, Alice. Time to think about a compromise!
I'm running out of patience, Bob. This is my last generous offer. Take it or leave it!
You're really running out of time, Alice. I'm not backing down!
This is my last realistic offer, Bob. Don't make me regret it!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not going to give in now.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. We're running out of time!
It's all or nothing now, Alice. I'm taking what's left.
